workshoptitle: Train Your Own BERT Model from Scratch with MosaicML

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Welcome to the BERT training lab, presented by MosaicML.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This lab covers the procedure for logging into the MosaicML tenancy of OCI for access to the JupyterLab service and notebooks.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Connect to Your Notebook
tutorials.description: A Jupyter notebook has been provisioned for you in the OCI Data Science service. Connect to the JupyterLab service and open your notebook.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Load Data into an Instance
Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
